description:
CICD CD : User creation switch.
Enable to let the CICD process automatically create a user called _CICD_DEPLOYMENT_#{40} per source environment to allow to pull changes from it.
This user will have the 'teamdev_user' or 'admin' role and a long random password which is sent in a secure way to the target environment to configure an 'update set source' pointing to this instance.
If this is disabled, this instance of ServiceNow must have a CD user configured.
name: cicd-integration.auto-create-cd-user
